endpoints.description: Retrieve a summary of environmental metrics and trends across monitored facilities.
Submit data regarding a detected environmental regulation violation incident.
Access emissions data specific to a particular facility by its identifier.
Update the operational thresholds for emission limits at the specified facility.
Remove a specific alert notification generated for compliance monitoring.
List resources and materials used that might impact environmental metrics.
Submit suggestions or feedback regarding environmental practices and system usage.
Access predicted emissions data based on current and historical trends.
Update user-defined preferences for notification and report types.
Manually enter environmental data readings to supplement automated sensor data.
